document_data.name: Delmath
document_data.mainbody: '''Delmath''' was an acquaintance of several guards in [[Shadowdale]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: While being spied by [[Malark Himbruel]] in the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, one guard related unto the others that he'd witnessed the [[spellfire]] wielded by [[Shandril Shessair]]. While describing her exertion, he compared her face to the one that Delmath himself made while lifting a heavy barrel.
